text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
The Spring Stakes is 1800 meters… 
Which is short compared to the 
races that await us later!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
With my speed, I could run 
through it in a flash!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'm going to win this thing, no problem!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
After this win, the next is the Satsuki
Sho. After that, the Japan Derby…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Yes, this is the gateway to my Classic
battlefield! Now that's something that
fills you with that fighting spirit!
choice_data_list:
Depending on the results… You haven't forgotten, 
have you?

Depending on the results… You haven't forgotten, 
have you?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Of course I haven't forgotten! Depending
on the results, it could be all about
the short distances this year.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
But that's not going to happen! There is
no way I'm going to lose!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Well, then! 
Please do expect a winning run!
